main.name: Vasuprada
main.description: passionate User Interface Developer with skills in Geographical Information Systems (GIS). I worked highly using Open Source Software's. Have developed Responsive UI for Websites, Android applications including Cross Platform Applications. Proficient in Full Application Development Lifecycle.
main.bio: Inspired to Learn, Determine to Teach
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: Developed Location based Applications. Have got Hands on in Web GIS and UI Development.

work.title: UI Developer
work.description: Technologies Worked-  HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Material Design, React JS, Java Springboot API's, Geoserver, PostgreSQL, Oracle, GIS, Keycloak, Azure. VSTS.Implemented reusable component structured code.Peer reviewed code to adhere coding standards. Operated with end-to-end ownership in complete phase, handling 2 Use cases. Worked as a Project Lead and Manager for a Use Case for a span of 3 months and delivered with high CSS 92%. Participated in complete development lifecycle - requirements analysis, design, coding, debugging, bug fixing and CI/CD configuration.
work.description2: Delivered code in time with zero issues in all Security Audits. Reduced work efforts of team by developing reusable components.        Received 5/5 First Anniversary Rating.        Facilitated meetings and presentation with Clients translating business       requirements to designs.       Have been a mentor of 20+ Knowledge Transfer sessions, Assisting in GIS and       Open Source Libraries.       Continual Improvement by working with extended teams and time      management.
